使用生物工程材料治疗化学疗法诱导的口腔病变一份新的研究论文发表在2025年2月18日的《 Oncotarget》第16卷中，标题为“仓鼠模型中5-氟尿嘧啶诱导的“白细胞减肥，体重减轻和口服粘膜炎：一种使用电气传播方法的再生方法” ）膜。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/ using-bioEngineered-materials-to-treat-treat-chemotherapy-tosed-soved-oral-lesions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/ using-bioEngineered-materials-to-treat-treat-chemotherapy-tosed-soved-oral-lesions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B6A0A2FB-333A-4CC5-BF25-BF25-BF25-B3A5ECF88877 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 13:07:49 -0500 Using bioengineered materials to treat chemotherapy-induced oral lesions
Insilico Medicine达到MASH药物发现中的临床前里程碑临床阶段生成人工智能（AI）驱动的药物发现公司Insilico Medicine（“ Insilico”）在与韩国基于韩国的生物技术公司的合作中，最近实现了临床前的里程碑，该公司专注于开发创新的第一in-In-Class。用于代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪性肝炎（MASH）的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/insilico-medicine-reaches-procleclinical-milestone-milestone-in-mash-mash-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/insilico-medicine-reaches-preclacilical-milestone-milestone-in-mash-mash-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=454f53A5-9C79-41B4-9A55-78A56FF58B48 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 13:04:14 -0500 Insilico Medicine reaches preclinical milestone in MASH drug discovery
新的AI工具可以改善学习障碍患者的护理计划已经开发了一种新的人工智能（AI）模型，以预测一个学习障碍者可能会留在医院的时间，提供有价值的见解，可以改善护理和资源计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/new-ai-tool-could-improve-care-care-planning-for-patients-patients-patients-with-learning-disabilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/new-ai-tool-could-improve-care-planning-for-patients-patients-with-learning-disabilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bf788a8a-5Ae6-4862-AC74-AEED1531DA86 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 13:00:24 -0500 New AI tool could improve care planning for patients with learning disabilities

研究人员挑战了对NF-1肿瘤生长的先前了解尽管以前考虑过，但新的研究表明，仅遗传变化无法解释遗传状况1型神经纤维瘤病（NF-1）的肿瘤的原因和何处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/researchers-challenge-previous-previous-undercanding-fumor-growth-in-nf-in-nf-1.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/researchers-challenge-previous-previous-undervious-underding-fumor-growth-in-nf-1.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5AAA3E1A-352E-424E-424E-98D8D8D21CE6EE8CD7 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 12:01:41 -0500 Researchers challenge previous understanding of tumor growth in NF-1
发现以对抗耐药癌细胞的新机制治疗癌症的一个特别挑战是抗治疗性。现在，一个国际研究小组发现了一种机制，该机制为肿瘤开辟了新的治疗策略，在这种肿瘤中，传统的化学治疗剂已达到限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/new-mechanism-uncovered-to-combat-therapy-therapy-comesistant-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/new-mechanism-uncovered to-combat-therapy-therapy-cancerant-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=370707Ae-07BB-4DBE-B034-9A4F0B8E9867 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 11:45:58 -0500 New mechanism uncovered to combat therapy-resistant cancer cells
